   - Hlela ngaphambili phambi kokuthenga kwaye ukhetha ikhadi lokuthenga elilungileyo.
   - Faka ulwazi lwakho lwegama, ibhizinisi, iindlela zokunceda abathengi ukukuthengisa, nanye nonyaka wokuthenga.
   - Beka ityala kwi-cart yokuthengisa kwaye qhuba ukunceda ukukhokela.

   - Faka ulwazi lwakho lwegama, ibhizinisi, iindlela zokunceda abathengi ukuxhumana, nanye nonyaka wokuxhumana.
   - Beka ityala kwi-cart yokuxhumana kwaye qhuba ukunceda ukukhokela.
